snippet: The five-stage complex will help the Shubert Organization, owner of 17 Broadway theaters, to move into commercial Off Broadway productions.
abstract: Shubert Organization plans to acquire Off Broadway complex of New World Stages; move will enable them to reassign flagging Broadway shows to new homes with fewer seats, keeping them profitable for a longer period.
lead_paragraph: The five-stage complex will help the Shubert Organization, owner of 17 Broadway theaters, to move into commercial Off Broadway productions.

headline.main: Shubert Organization Set To Add New World Stages
headline.print_headline: Shubert Organization Set to Add New World Stages
